scripts.build: npm run b-mote && npm run b-mote-nodejs
scripts.ln-mote-nodejs: cd modules/mote-nodejs && npm ln @kwaia/mote && npm ln
scripts.pi-mote: npm run ln-mote && npm run i-mote
scripts.pi-mote-nodejs: npm run ln-mote-nodejs && npm run i-mote-nodejs
scripts.postinstall: npm run pi-mote && npm run pi-mote-nodejs
scripts.test: npm run t-mote && npm run t-mote-nodejs
